sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_faction_city (f_faction_id, f_tax_rate, f_yd_taxes, f_td_taxes, f_all_taxes, f_isget_taxes, f_isget_bangzhu, f_isget_fubangzhu, f_isgetdazhanglao, f_isgetdashixiong, f_isgetdashijie, f_lingqu_time, f_update_time, f_notice) values (#factionId:INTEGER#, #taxRate:INTEGER#, #ydTaxes:INTEGER#, #tdTaxes:INTEGER#, #allTaxes:BIGINT#, #isgetTaxes:INTEGER#, #isgetBangzhu:INTEGER#, #isgetFubangzhu:INTEGER#, #isgetdazhanglao:INTEGER#, #isgetdashixiong:INTEGER#, #isgetdashijie:INTEGER#, #lingquTime:TIMESTAMP#, #updateTime:TIMESTAMP#, #notice:VARCHAR#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update t_faction_city set f_faction_id = #factionId:INTEGER#, f_tax_rate = #taxRate:INTEGER#, f_yd_taxes = #ydTaxes:INTEGER#, f_td_taxes = #tdTaxes:INTEGER#, f_all_taxes = #allTaxes:BIGINT#, f_isget_taxes = #isgetTaxes:INTEGER#, f_isget_bangzhu = #isgetBangzhu:INTEGER#, f_isget_fubangzhu = #isgetFubangzhu:INTEGER#, f_isgetdazhanglao = #isgetdazhanglao:INTEGER#, f_isgetdashixiong = #isgetdashixiong:INTEGER#, f_isgetdashijie = #isgetdashijie:INTEGER#, f_lingqu_time = #lingquTime:TIMESTAMP#, f_update_time = #updateTime:TIMESTAMP#, f_notice = #notice:VARCHAR# where f_id = #id:INTEGER#
